alert.note: Alert for Independence (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:28PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Independence County through 515 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 4 miles northeast of Cushman and 4 miles north of Sulphur Rock. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Batesville... Newark... Cushman... Oil Trough... Magness... Moorefield... Salado... Southside in Independence Count... Sulphur Rock... Bethesda... Charlotte... Rosie... Gainesboro... Desha... Pfeiffer... Locust Grove... Sandtown... Cord... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
